LanguageData.VSIE.WorkFrenzyBeginLetterContinue: \n\n{PAWN_pronoun} would like to do some work.
LanguageData.VSIE.GoFrenzyBeginLetterContinue: \n\n{PAWN_pronoun} would like to join a caravan and venture into the world.
LanguageData.VSIE.ShootingFrenzyBeginLetterContinue: \n\n{PAWN_pronoun} would like to go on a hunt.
LanguageData.VSIE.InspiredTradeBeginLetterContinue: \n\n{PAWN_pronoun} would like to close a trade.
LanguageData.VSIE.InspiredRecruitmentBeginLetterConti: \n\n{PAWN_pronoun} would like to recruit a prisoner.
LanguageData.VSIE.InspiredTamingBeginLetterContinue: \n\n{PAWN_pronoun} would like to try and tame an animal.
LanguageData.VSIE.InspiredSurgeryBeginLetterContinue: \n\n{PAWN_pronoun} would like to perform a surgery.
LanguageData.VSIE.InspiredCreativityBeginLetterContin: \n\n{PAWN_pronoun} would like to create a masterwork or legendary item.
LanguageData.VSIE.TraitChangePrisonerRecruited: When you recruited {PAWN_nameDef}, it turned out that {PAWN_pronoun} has the {0} trait.\n\n{1}
LanguageData.VSIE.TraitChangePawnResurrected: When {PAWN_nameDef} died and got brought back to life, noticed that they now have the {0} trait.\n\n{1}
LanguageData.VSIE.TraitChangePawnHasCatatonicBreakdow: When {PAWN_nameDef} succumbed to the catatonic mental breakdown, {PAWN_pronoun} has developed the {0} trait.\n\n{1}
LanguageData.VSIE.TraitChangeFamilyMemberDied: When {PAWN_nameDef}’s family member died, {PAWN_pronoun} has developed the {0} trait.\n\n{1}
LanguageData.VSIE.CatarhisAfterMentalBreak: {PAWN_nameDef}’s extreme mental break caused a permanent character change, as {PAWN_pronoun} has developed the {0} trait.\n\n{1}
LanguageData.VSIE.RecoveredAfterDeadlyDisease: The time {PAWN_nameDef} spent fighting the deadly illness was enough time for a self-reflection, as {PAWN_pronoun} has developed the {0} trait.\n\n{1}
LanguageData.VSIE.BirthdayEvent: {PAWN_nameDef} took a moment to reflect upon themself on their birthday, which resulted in developing the {0} trait.\n\n{1}
LanguageData.VSIE.BestowingCeremony: Possibly the greatest moment in {PAWN_nameDef}’s life, a bestowing ceremony, allowed them to develop the {0} trait.\n\n{1}
LanguageData.VSIE.ToughtRaidEvent: After recent events and the difficult raid the colony faced, {PAWN_nameDef} reflected upon themself and developed the {0} trait.\n\n{1}
LanguageData.VSIE.Discord: A group social fight has broke out.
LanguageData.VSIE.OneNightStandText: {INITIATOR_nameDef} engages in a one night stand with {PARTNER_nameDef}. Whilst both pawns receive all the benefits of regular lovin’, they are not a couple.
LanguageData.VSIE.EnableManyHandsMakeLightWork: Enable many hands make light work
